biography.about_me: I received the joint B.Sc. and M.Sc. degree in computer science and Ph.D. degree in computer engineering from Prince of Songkla University, Thailand, in 2005 and 2011, respectively. I am currently a Researcher and Lecturer with the School of Informatics, Walailak University, Thailand.
biography.research_focus_statement: My research focuses on applying artificial intelligence to enhance cybersecurity and network monitoring capabilities in IoT and distributed systems.
